content.rendered:
Festival goers at Nowhere, in the dusty Aragon desert, Spain. The festival is based on the same principles as Burning Man, but is somewhat smaller, with about 1,000 revellers taking part as apposed to the 60,000 who will converge in the Nevada desert this September.

It was fun.
